languages.text: "И Он вручил его лично тебе? Император поручил заботам своих слуг будущее Человечества, но люди слишком слабы и дурны, чтобы оправдать Его доверие. Очищает только страдание, а мы боимся его и остаемся в грязи".

traits.locale_text: "И Он вручил его лично тебе? Император поручил заботам своих слуг будущее человечества, но люди слишком слабы и дурны, чтобы оправдать Его доверие. Очищает только страдание, а мы боимся его и остаемся в грязи".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "And did He grant it to you personally? The Emperor has entrusted His servants with the future of Humanity, but people are too weak and flawed to prove themselves worthy of His trust. Only suffering can cleanse us, but we fear it and thus remain sullied."
languages.original_text: "И Он вручил его лично тебе? Император поручил заботам своих слуг будущее Человечества, но люди слишком слабы и дурны, чтобы оправдать Его доверие. Очищает только страдание, а мы боимся его и остаемся в грязи".

traits.locale_text: "And did He grant it to you personally? The Emperor has entrusted His servants with the future of humanity, but people are too weak and flawed to live up to His trust. Only suffering can cleanse us, but we fear it and thus remain sordid."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "And did He grant it to you personally? The Emperor has entrusted His servants with the future of humanity, but people are too weak and flawed to live up to His trust. Only suffering can cleanse us, but we fear it and thus remain sordid."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "And did He grant it to you personally? The Emperor has entrusted His servants with the future of Humanity, but people are too weak and flawed to prove themselves worthy of His trust. Only suffering can cleanse us, but we fear it and thus remain sullied."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "And did He grant it to you personally? The Emperor has entrusted His servants with the future of Humanity, but people are too weak and flawed to prove themselves worthy of His trust. Only suffering can cleanse us, but we fear it and thus remain sullied."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "And did He grant it to you personally? The Emperor has entrusted His servants with the future of Humanity, but people are too weak and flawed to prove themselves worthy of His trust. Only suffering can cleanse us, but we fear it and thus remain sullied."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “祂是当面亲自授予你的吗？帝皇把人类的未来托付给祂的仆人，但人类太软弱、有太多缺陷，无法配得上祂的信任。只有苦难才能净化我们，但我们惧怕苦难，因此我们仍然充满罪恶。”
languages.original_text: "And did He grant it to you personally? The Emperor has entrusted His servants with the future of Humanity, but people are too weak and flawed to prove themselves worthy of His trust. Only suffering can cleanse us, but we fear it and thus remain sullied."

traits.locale_text: “祂是当面亲自授予你的吗？帝皇把人类的未来托付给祂的仆人，但人类太软弱、有太多缺陷，无法配得上祂的信任。只有苦难才能净化我们，但我们惧怕苦难，因此我们仍然充满罪恶。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «¿Y se la entregó Él en persona? El Emperador ha confiado el futuro de la Humanidad a sus siervos, pero la gente es demasiado débil y tiene demasiados defectos como para demostrar que son dignos de Su confianza. Solo el sufrimiento podría purificarnos, pero lo tememos, y eso nos condena».
languages.original_text: "And did He grant it to you personally? The Emperor has entrusted His servants with the future of Humanity, but people are too weak and flawed to prove themselves worthy of His trust. Only suffering can cleanse us, but we fear it and thus remain sullied."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y se la entregó Él en persona? El Emperador ha confiado el futuro de la Humanidad a sus siervos, pero la gente es demasiado débil y tiene demasiados defectos como para demostrar que son dignos de Su confianza. Solo el sufrimiento podría purificarnos, pero lo tememos, y eso nos condena».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「それは皇帝から直々にあなたに与えられたものでしょうか？皇帝は人類の未来を彼の従僕たちに託されたが、人々はあまりにも弱く、欠陥だらけで、皇帝の信頼に値すると証明することができない。我々は苦難によってのみ自らを浄化できるが、我々はそれを恐れ、それゆえに穢れたままなのです」
languages.original_text: "And did He grant it to you personally? The Emperor has entrusted His servants with the future of Humanity, but people are too weak and flawed to prove themselves worthy of His trust. Only suffering can cleanse us, but we fear it and thus remain sullied."

traits.locale_text: 「それは皇帝から直々にあなたに与えられたものでしょうか？皇帝は人類の未来を彼の従僕たちに託されたが、人々はあまりにも弱く、欠陥だらけで、皇帝の信頼に値すると証明することができない。我々は苦難によってのみ自らを浄化できるが、我々はそれを恐れ、それゆえに穢れたままなのです」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Und hat er ihn Euch persönlich überreicht? Der Imperator hat seinen Dienern die Zukunft der Menschheit anvertraut, aber die Leute sind zu schwach und fehlerbehaftet, um sich seines Vertrauens würdig zu erweisen. Nur das Leid kann uns reinigen, aber wir fürchten es und bleiben darum beschmutzt."
languages.original_text: "And did He grant it to you personally? The Emperor has entrusted His servants with the future of Humanity, but people are too weak and flawed to prove themselves worthy of His trust. Only suffering can cleanse us, but we fear it and thus remain sullied."

traits.locale_text: "Und hat er ihn Euch persönlich überreicht? Der Imperator hat seinen Dienern die Zukunft der Menschheit anvertraut, aber die Leute sind zu schwach und fehlerbehaftet, um sich seines Vertrauens würdig zu erweisen. Nur das Leid kann uns reinigen, aber wir fürchten es und bleiben darum beschmutzt."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Vous l'a-t-Il remise en personne, cette lettre ? L'Empereur confie l'avenir de l'humanité à Ses serviteurs. Hélas, les gens sont trop faibles et imparfaits pour se montrer dignes de cette confiance. Alors que seule la souffrance peut nous purifier, nous la craignons et restons donc souillés. »
languages.original_text: "And did He grant it to you personally? The Emperor has entrusted His servants with the future of Humanity, but people are too weak and flawed to prove themselves worthy of His trust. Only suffering can cleanse us, but we fear it and thus remain sullied."

traits.locale_text: « Vous l'a-t-Il remise en personne, cette lettre ? L'Empereur confie l'avenir de l'humanité à Ses serviteurs. Hélas, les gens sont trop faibles et imparfaits pour se montrer dignes de cette confiance. Alors que seule la souffrance peut nous purifier, nous la craignons et restons donc souillés. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Peki Ruhsatname'ni bizzat O mu verdi? İmparator, İnsanlığın geleceğini hizmetkârlarına emanet etmiştir. İnsanlarsa zayıflıkları ve kusurlarıyla O'nun güvenine layık olmadıklarını kanıtlamıştır. Bizi yalnızca acı arındırabilir. Gelgelelim acıdan korkuyor, o yüzden de kirlerimizden bir türlü kurtulamıyoruz."
languages.original_text: "And did He grant it to you personally? The Emperor has entrusted His servants with the future of Humanity, but people are too weak and flawed to prove themselves worthy of His trust. Only suffering can cleanse us, but we fear it and thus remain sullied."

traits.locale_text: "Peki sana onu bizzat mı verdi? İmparator, İnsanlığın geleceğini hizmetkârlarına emanet etti ama insanlar zayıflıkları ve kusurlarıyla O'nun güvenine layık olmadıklarını kanıtladılar. Bizi yalnızca acı arındırabilir ama ondan korkuyor ve üzerimizdeki kirle kalıyoruz."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
